titleStmt.title: Capt. Johnstons last farewell who was arraigned for being assisting in the stealing a young heiress, for which he received sentance of death, and was accordingly executed at Tyburn, the 23d. of this instant December, 1690. To the tune of Russel's farewel. Licensed according to order.
Capt. Johnson's last farewel to the world.

Capt. Johnstons last farewell who was arraigned for being assisting in the stealing a young heiress, for which he received sentance of death, and was accordingly executed at Tyburn, the 23d. of this instant December, 1690. To the tune of Russel's farewel. Licensed according to order.
Capt. Johnson's last farewel to the world.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Charles Bates, at the Bible and Sun in Pye-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "You noble lords of high degree,".
Place and date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
